overview: Yeon-joon knows that her husband, Chan-jun, who often stays out of bed, is having an affair, but he is living for the peace of the family.  Then one day, Yeon-joo, who is alone at home, is sexually harassed by a knight called by Kang-  seo. Fortunately, she escapes from the crisis with the help of Kang-seo, who arrives late.  However, Chan-jun, who went to the police station to deal with this matter, believes in the article's ass saying that Yeon-yeon seduced first, begins to blame Yeon-joo, and eventually ravages Yeon-joo, claiming innocence. You will be shocked to see it.  Chan-jun, who has finally decided to divorce, leaves the house first, and Gangseo-do says goodbye to Yeon-yeon.  Yeon-joo, who was sad at her injustice, says that even Kang-seo is leaving her house, so she gets desperate and catches Kang-seo, but in the end, Yeon-joo and Kang-seo, who confirm each other's feelings, have sex to comfort each other.
title: Good Bachelor
